prompts: Create a rabbit-like Pokemon that embodies the spirit of fire and agility.
I want a sleek, energetic Pokemon that showcases a mix of orange and gray tones.
Generate a bipedal Pokemon with vibrant colors and a playful demeanor.
Make a unique Pokemon that evolves from a timid starter into a bold fighter.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and has a cute, sporty look.
Design a fiery Pokemon that's swift on its feet and has distinct ear features.
Show me a Pokemon that combines elements of agility and fire in its design.
